授業目的: Students of chemistry or non-chemistry majors are recommmended to take this course which is related to general chemistry, fundamental to doing scientific research including experiments and theories. Students should have learned general chemistry in their undergraduate schools, so students will be expected to focus more on atomic or molecular levels of matters in this class.
到達目標:
Students may be able to understand the following comprehensive concepts of chemistry:
(1) chemical elements
(2) chemical equilibrium
(3) chemical kinetics
(4) reaction mechanism
(5) electrochemistry
授業方法:
Lectures with ppt slides
※Online lectures will be given, for details including ZOOM links please check LUNA.

トピック.授業外学習2: Assignments may be given during the classes.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.

name: 【511】国際自然科学特殊講義V【化学総論】／Special Lec. in Int'l Natural Sci.V
